TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Syria, title = Syria, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syria} }

S.FORM: Syria hya' ga cyux maki' tay 35 00 N, 38 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 185,180 sq km (maki' tay 89ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 183,630 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 1,550 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 17,185,170. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 75.80% , lhlahuy hya' ga 2.70%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 21.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Damascus. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 17 na tay spayat byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Bashar al-Assad, aring ryax 17 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2000 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Syria hya' ga cyox maki' tay 35 00 N, 38 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 185,180 sq km (maki' tay 89ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 183,630 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 1,550 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 17,185,170. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 75.80% , lhlahoy hya' ga 2.70%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 21.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Damascos. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 17 na tay spayat byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Bashar al-Assad, aring ryax 17 sqo byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2000 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
